channel.title: Excel on Sudeep's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Sudeep's Blog

item.title: Count total Years, Months and Days between two dates in Excel
item.description:
In this post we will see how we can calculate total number of years, months and days between two dates.

For example: If the start date is 2 October 2021 and end date is 3 November 2022 then we should get 1year 1month 1day.

item.title: Excel tutorial for Splitting bills and sharing expenses among friends
item.description: In this post, i will share an Excel tutorial where you can create tables and calculate the total amount spent by each person and find out who owes or need to give to whom.

item.title: Useful Excel formulas and tricks
item.description: In this post, i will be sharing some commonly used excel formulas to make your life easier while creating report.
